It would be fair to expect a lul in the penultimate week of a 7 week course but, if anything, things are picking up. The skills weâ€™ve hacked together over our short time here, are close to being well rounded enough to begin real work. We are hoping to begin our first paid web development, . Seven days to fill in a database/testing sized hole and we should be ready. It is incredible what you can do in a short space of time, with enough work and commitment.
